name: Egregious Pilot Error
Lore: 'Details of the notorious ''Incident at Anoat'' are required reading at the Imperial Academy of Raithal, where the pilots'' names are posthumously displayed.',
Text: 'During opponent''s control phase, if opponent has two or more capital starships at a system or sector together, draw destiny. If destiny -1 < number of those starships, they may not move or participate in battle until end of your next turn.',
